question: The "Battle of Chacabuco" was part of which nation's struggle for independence?
explanation: Battle of Chacabuco of 1817 was fought during the Chilean War of Independence. In this battle, the Chilean Andes Force defeated the Spanish force. It was fought on February 12, 1817. This victory in the war leads to the beginning of the "Patria Nueva" period in Chile's history which helped the consolidation and progress of the Chilean Independence Movement.
